Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Houston (Northwest Houston), Element by Westin Houston Vintage Park is close to Aerodrome Ice Skating Complex and Champions Golf Club. This hotel is within the vicinity of Willowbrook Mall and AMC 24 Theaters.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 123 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Wired and wireless Internet access is complimentary, while 32-inch LCD televisions with digital programming provide entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a fitness center, and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in the lobby, and a picnic area.

Dining
A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and express check-in. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Houston (Northwest Houston), Element by Westin Houston Vintage Park is close to Aerodrome Ice Skating Complex and Champions Golf Club. This hotel is within the vicinity of Willowbrook Mall and AMC 24 Theaters.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Aerodrome Ice Skating Complex - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Champions Golf Club - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Willowbrook Mall - 4.8 km / 3 mi
AMC 24 Theaters - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Gleanloch Pines Golf Club - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
Longwood Golf Club - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Sam Houston Race Park - 8 km / 5 mi
Northwest Forest Conference Center - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
Jersey Meadow Golf Course - 10.9 km / 6.7 mi
Houston National Golf Club - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
Traders Village - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi
TGR Exotics Wildlife Park - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Tomball Museum Center - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Blackhorse Golf Club - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Cypress Lakes Golf Club - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi

The preferred airport for Element by Westin Houston Vintage Park is Houston, TX (IAH-George Bush Intercontinental) - 22 km / 13.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
